{"id":1278417017,"question_id":665,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1717588537,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1278417017/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean checkPossibility(int[] nums) {\n\n        int len = nums.length;\n        int cnt = 0;\n        // non-desc\n        // equal or asc\n\n        int min = nums[1];\n        for(int i=0; i<len-1; i++){\n\n            if(nums[i]<=nums[i+1]){\n                min = Math.min(min, nums[i]);\n                continue;\n            }else{\n\n                if(nums[i+1]<min) return false;\n                cnt++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return cnt<=1;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
